1235:2: tadevaṃ svabhāvahetau tādātmyasiddhinibandhanamanvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinimittatvāt tayostasyāśca pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanāyāḥ prāgeva darśitatvāt tagdatamaparamapi pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇapanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayannāha- “arthāntare” hetorvyatirikte vastuni gamye “kāryaṃ hetuḥ”|
1235:4: kasmāt punararthāntare kāryameva heturityāha- “avyabhicārāt” iti kāryameva hyarthāntaraṃ na vyabhicarati nānyat yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryamevārthāntare gamye heturucyate saṃyogavaśāgdamakatve|
1235:5: “na ca kenacit” ityādinā yaḥ sarvvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ācāryeṇoktaḥ parasya,
1235:6: tamihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayedityāśaṅkamāna āha- “kāryakāraṇa-” ityādi|
1235:7: yadi hi kāryaṃ heturucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam|
1235:8: tathā ca sati sarvvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti|
1235:9: agneḥ sāmānyadharmmavad viśeṣadharmmā api tārṇṇapārṇṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ|
1235:10: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo'pi sāmānyadharmmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ|
1235:13: sa ca nāgnidhūmayoraṃśena api tu sarvveṇa prakāreṇa|
1235:15: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatairvviśeṣadharmmairjanyaḥ tathā sāmānyadharmmairapi sattvadravyatvādibhiḥ|
1235:16: tataśca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
1235:18: atrāha-“na sarvvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ” tataśca kutastathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt ?|
1235:20: “tadabhāve” teṣāṃ tārṇṇapārṇṇatvādināṃ viśeṣadharmmāṇāmabhāve “bhavato” dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmmebhyo bhavatīti evamātmanaḥ “tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt”|
1235:21: tathā “tadabhāve” agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ sāmānyadharmmasyāgnerevāyaṃ bhavatī tyevaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ ?
1235:23: na hyasati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ|
1235:24: yata evaṃ “tasmāt kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “svabhāvairyāvabhdi” rdhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ|
1235:29: kāraṇāśritairyāvabhdiḥ svabhāvairvvinā te kāryagatāḥ svabhāvā na bhavanti hetuḥ taisteṣāmiti gamyate|
1235:32: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvairyāvabhdiragnitvadravyatvādibhiravinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam|
1235:33: kasmāt ? ityāha- “tatkāryatvaniyamāt” teṣāmeva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmmānāṃ tat kāryamityevaṃrūpasya niyamasya sabhdāvāt|
1235:34: nahi tān sāmānyadharmmān kadācidapi kāryaṃ vyabhicarati|
1235:35: evaṃ kāraṇagatamaṃśaṃ pāścātyenārthena nirūpya prāktanenārthena kāryagatamaṃśaṃ nirūpayannāha- “taireva ca” ityādi|
1235:36: kāryamapi taireva dharmmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmmāṇāṃ gamakam yathā'ntarā sambhavino dhūmatvapāṇḍupārṇṇatvādayo viśeṣarūpāstaiḥ kāraṇagataiḥ sāmānyadharmmairvvinā na bhavanti|
1235:39: na hi te viśeṣadharmmāḥ kāryagatāḥ kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmmairvvinā kadācidapi bhavanti|
1235:42: tadevaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmmāḥ,
1235:43: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmmāḥ,
1235:45: ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣadharmmā yaistatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ|
1235:46: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmmā dravyatvādayasteṣāmapi tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvādeva gamakatvaṃ nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pareṣāmiva prasajyeta ?|
1235:47: [2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam|]
1235:49: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamādiṣyante,
1235:51: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmmāḥ,
1235:52: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmmā iti syāt|
1235:58: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatairvviśeṣadharmmairjanyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate,
1235:60: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādi upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ teṣāṃ cābhimatatvāgdamakatvasya|
1235:61: tathā hi-agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavatyeva tadagneranumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādinā'gneranumānam|
1235:62: na hi sarvvathā janyajanakabhāvo'stītyeva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati,
1235:64: tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa liṅgasya gamakatvam,
1235:66: jñāpako hi svaniścayāpekṣo jñāpyamarthaṃ jñāpayati, nānyathā|
1235:69: sarvvathā janyajanakabhāvābhyupagame tadabhāve bhāvasyaivābhāvādityata āha- “aviśiṣṭa”- ityādi|
1235:70: yadi hi tajjanyaviśeṣa grahaṇarahitamaviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamātramupādīyate liṅgaviśeṣopādhirahitaṃ vā dravyādikaṃ tadā “aviśiṣṭasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ” kāraṇagataviśeṣābhāve'pi dhūmamātrasya bhāvāt tadaviśiṣṭasya ca dravyatvāderagnyabhāve'pi bhāvād vyabhicāra iti sarvvathā janyajanakabhāvo neṣyate,
1235:79: tathā yadyapi dravyatvasattvamātramagnyabhāve'pi bhavati na tu dhūmātmakamiti tadviśiṣṭasyāvyabhicārād gamakatvamapi na vāryata iti|
1235:81: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha-“kasyacit” dhūmādeḥ “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “kutaścit” agnyādeḥ “bhāve'pi” sati “sarvvo” dhūmādiḥ “tādṛśo” yādṛśa ekadā'gnyāderbhavana dṛṣṭa tajjātīyaḥ,
1235:82: “tathāvidhajanmā” yathāvidhāt sa eko bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśādeva janma yasya sa|
1235:85: tathāhi-yadi nāma pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kasyaciddhūmasyāgnyādisāmagrīkāryatvamavagataṃ kimetāvatā'nyasyāpi tādṛśasya tādṛśakāryatā sidhyati,
1235:90: evaṃ hi kasyāściddhūmavyakteragnyādijanyatā dṛṣṭeti kinna ghaṭāderapi sā'bhyupagamyate ?
1235:93: iti cet ; tathā ca pramāṇābhāvena tathāvidhajanmatvāniścayādatādṛśādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ tādṛśasya dhūmāderagnyādinā'nvayavyatirekau na niścitāviti kutaḥ kāryahetorggamakatvam ?|
1235:94: na hi yo'sāveko deśakālāvasthāniyato'gniviśeṣahetuko dhūmo'dhigataḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tasyaivānvayavyatirekau pratipattavyau|
1235:97: tādṛśasya sāmānyātmana eva liṅgatvāt tasya cātathāvidhādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ kutastathāvidhenānvayo vyatireko vā ?| taduktam-
1235:102: evaṃ manyate-ihaikadā dhūmāderagnyādisāmagrījanyatayā pratyākṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitarūpatve'pi tādṛśasyātādṛśādapi bhāvaḥ samāśaṅkyate yathāparidṛṣṭādanyatvena|
1235:103: tatra yo'sāvagnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmaviśeṣa ekadā niścitastadapekṣayā yathā'nyo dhūmaviśeṣastādṛśo yo'nyādṛśādapi-bhāvānāṃ vicitraśaktitayā-bhavediti śaṅkayate,
1235:105: tatra yadi tadanyasya tādṛśasyātādṛśājjanma syāt tadā tādṛśasya svabhāvasya nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvateti paridṛṣṭasyāpi dhūmasya nāgnyādisāmagrī kāraṇamityāyātam|
1235:107: tataścāgnyādisāmagryā akāraṇatvāt yo mayaikadā tato bhavan dṛṣṭo dhūmaḥ so'pi na bhavet|
1235:108: nahi yad yasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati tat tataḥ sakṛdapi jāyate,
1235:113: atasmād bhavituṃ śīlaṃyasya tasyātabhdāvinastādṛśasya tallakṣaṇasya dhūmavastunaḥ “sakṛdapi” ekadā'pi “tataḥ” agnyādeḥ “abhāvād” bhāvavirodhāt|
1235:114: bhavati ca tādṛśo'gnyādisāmagrītaḥ tatastādṛśasya svabhāvasya tādṛśameva kāraṇamityavagamyate sakṛtpravṛttābhyāmeva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmiti kuto vyabhicārāśaṅkā ?|
1235:115: tena yādṛśo dhūmo'gnyādisāmagryā bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt tādṛśasya tasya tajjanyasvabhāvatayā tādṛśādeva bhāvāt ‘yatra dhūmastatrāgnyādisāmagrī’ ityanvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ|
1235:116: athavā'nyathā vyākhyāyate- iha pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanā kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ prāguktā tannibandhanāvanvayavyatirekau pratipādayitum,
1235:118: tathā hi- “kasyacit” dhūmasyāgnyādisāmagryanantarabhāvina ādyasya “kadācit” prathamotpādakāle “kutaścid” agnyādisāmagryāḥ “bhāve'pi” utpāde'pi “sarvvastādṛśo” yādṛśaḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvī dhūmo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣvapi tādṛśaḥ pratyakṣata eva tasya pūrvvakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇatayā pratīteḥ|
1235:119: “tathāvidhajanmā” iti yathāvidhādagnīndhanasāmagrīlakṣaṇāt kāraṇādādyo dhūmakṣaṇa utpannastathāvidhājjanma yasya sa “tathāvidhajanmetyetat kutaḥ” naiva tasya dhūmāderabhāvāt|
1235:120: evaṃ ca yadyato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyānyato'pi bhāvasya darśanāt sarvvatrānāśvāsa iti manyamāna āha- “tathā ca” anagnito dhūmādapi dhūmasya bhāve śakramūrddhāderapi tasya bhāvāvirodhādagninā dhūmasya nanvayavyatirekāviti cenmanyase iti pūrvvapakṣāśaṅkā|
1235:126: siddhāntavādyāha- nā'gnīndhanasāmagrījanyo yādṛśo dhūmastādṛśa eva dhūmādapi bhavati kāraṇabhedena|
1235:128: tādṛśo hyagnīndhanasāmagrīkṣaṇāntarajanya ādya evāparaḥ kṣaṇastathā tadanya ādya evāparāgnīndhanasāmagrījanya iti tādṛśasya dhūmasya dhūmādasambhavāt na kvacidanāśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ|
1235:129: tathā yādṛśo dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvī prathamadhūmakṣaṇajanito dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo'paraprathamadhūmakṣaṇajanita eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇo na tṛtīyādiḥ|
1235:132: iti cet, āha- “atabhdāvinaḥ” atasmād-anagnīndhanādirūpād dhūmād bhavanaśīlasya prathamakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇasya dhūmasya “sakṛdapi” ekadāpi “tataḥ” agnyādisāmagryāḥ “abhāvāda” bhāvāyogād|
1235:133: yathā hi prathamakṣaṇāpekṣayā dvitīyastādṛśastathā tadapekṣayā prathamo'pīti tādṛśatvāviśeṣāt tādṛśasyānagnito bhāve tādṛśo nāgnijanyasvabhāvaḥ iti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet|
1235:134: bhavan vā tajjanyasvabhāvatāmātmānastādṛśaḥ khyāpayatīti kuto'nyādṛśād bhavet ?
1235:135: tasmādanyādṛśād bhavannanyādṛśa eva tato na vyabhicāraḥ|
1235:137: nanu sarvveṣāṃ dhūmakṣāṇānāṃ kaṇṭhakṣaṇanākṣisrutikālīkaraṇādikāyāmarthakriyāyāmupayogāt kathaṃ tādṛśasvabhāvatā na syāt ?|
1235:138: na, tasyā apyarthakriyāyāḥ kṣaṇabhedopadhīyamānarūpāyāḥ tādṛśatvābhāvāt tatrāpi tulyadoṣatvāt|
1235:139: kathaṃ tarhi loke sarvvatra dhūmavyavahāraḥ iti cet;
1235:141: sādṛśye sati kathaṃ na tādṛśatā ? iti cet|
1235:143: tathā hi-gosadṛśo bhavati gavayaḥ na tu tādṛśaḥ,
1235:145: paramārthenātādṛśe'pi tādṛśābhimāno mandamatīnāṃ bhavan kathaṃ nivārtyet ?|
1235:146: tathā hi-tattvādhyavasāyo'pi tāvad-atasminnarvvāgdṛśāṃ vinivārayituṃ na pāryate,
1235:150: tattvacintakāstu tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇabhedāt tādṛśātādṛśatāṃ bhāvānāṃ anumanyante na tādṛśatām|
1235:151: tad yadyatādṛśādapi tadṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ityatadbhāvinaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo na syāt|
1235:155: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ,
1235:159: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham ?
1235:160: ityata āha- “tatra” etasmin nyāye sati “yadi dhūmo” yādṛśa ādyo'gnyādisāmagrījanitastādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī “agnyādisāmagryā” agnīndhanādikāraṇakalāpāt tajjanakasvabhāvatayā nirddhāritā “danyato”'gnīndhanādisāmagrījanitādādyāddhūmakṣaṇād bhavet|
1235:161: tadā “tasya” tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya “tajjanyo”'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ “svabhāvo na bhavati” kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛdapi “tato”'gnyādisāmagrīto “na bhaveta”|
1235:163: nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo yujyeta|
1235:165: yathā hyarthāntaramatajjanyābhimatamanyato bhavat na tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvamiti sakṛdapi tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo'pīti tato bhavannanyādṛśa evāsāviti gamyate|
1235:166: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagryā'sāvatajjanyasvabhāvo'pi tādṛśo balājjanyate kastasya tapasvino'parādhaḥ ?
1235:167: ityata āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ svayamatajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet,
1235:168: kintvagnyādisāmagryapi taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ-yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī-na janayet|
1235:171: tādṛśasya hyanyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet ?|
1235:174: tathā hi- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvamanusṛtyaiva pravarttate,
1235:177: syānmatam-agnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvo'pi tādṛśo dhūmo dhūmajanyasvabhāvo'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo'gnijanyasvabhāvaścobhayato bhavati|
1235:178: tathā tādṛśo'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “na ca” naiva “dhūmasya” tādṛśasya “tadatajjanyaḥ” agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmajanyaśca “svabhāvo yuktaḥ” yuktyā saṅgataḥ|
1235:182: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatastādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt|
1235:187: tenāgnidhūmalakṣaṇāt “dhūmādhūmajananasvabhāvāt” tādṛśātādṛśajananasvabhāvāt tādṛśātādṛśatayā'sya bhavato dhūmādhūma[svabhāva]stādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvaḥ syāt kutastādṛśa eva ?|
1235:189: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt|
1235:192: kāryāṇāmutpattimātra eva kāraṇāpekṣaṇādityata āha- “akāraṇāpekṣaṇe ca” tādṛśātādṛśarūpatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśa-kāraṇānapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśatāyāḥ “ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt”|
1235:193: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayorabhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ yatra tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvakāraṇanirapekṣāṇāmapi tadapekṣā syāt|
1235:195: tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt|
1235:196: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvādeva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto'nyādṛśāttādṛśasambhavaḥ ? iti|
1235:197: yattūktaṃ ‘yathaiko dhūmo'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇamapi kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇādapi sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati’ iti|
1235:199: yato nāsmābhirvvilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayantyeva paraspavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmmāṇastadavasthāniyatāḥ tadekaṃ kāryaṃ,
1235:200: tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśādeva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt,
1235:204: yadi tvagnirivendhanopādānopakṛtastadupādānopakṛtaṃ cendhanamiva tadavasthāniyatamatādṛśamapi dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathā'vagamyeta tadā'gnyādivat so'pi tajjananasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśajanakaḥ kena nānumanyeta|
1235:205: tadabhāve'pi tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayorjanyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatetyahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt|
1235:206: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” so'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo “yaḥ” ādya “dhūmajanano” nānyaḥ “sa” dhūma ādyo yaḥ “gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa” janito nānya a iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya niyamād yādṛśaṃ yasya kāraṇamekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmevāvadhāritaṃ “tadvijātīyāt” tato'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt “utpattiḥ” tādṛśasya kāryasya “na bhavati” anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti|
1235:207: tadevaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇakṛtakatvaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāryasvabhāvasya pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tat” tasmāt yādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamekadā tat t“nna vyabhicarati” tādṛśamanyādṛśānna bhavati|
1235:208: yanaivaṃ “tena” kāraṇena “siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve” tādṛśasya “kāryasya” tādṛśameva kāraṇamiti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena “kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptira”nvayavyatirekarūpā “siddhā” bhavati|
1235:209: “na vijātīyādutpattiriti” dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇādanyādṛśānnotpattirityasamumarthamapratipadyamānaḥ kāryasya vijātīyāt kāraṇānnotpattirityayamatrārtho'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraścodayannāha- “nanu” svato “vijātīyādapi” kāraṇāt “kiñcit” kāryaṃ “bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ” tat kathaṃ na vijātīyādutpattirityasya na dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ syāt|
1235:210: kathaṃ yathā ityāha- “tad yathā gomayādeḥ” ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ “ śālūkādi” ādigrahaṇāccharodakādi|
1235:211: tathā hi- gomayācchālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāccharasya candrakāntādapāma|
1235:212: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkādernna vijātīyam tat kimucyate na vijātīyādutpattiḥ iti|
1235:213: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayannāha- “na vijātīyādutpattiḥ” iti|
1235:214: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato'nyādṛśānna bhavati ityayamatrārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
1235:217: tadāha-“tathāvidhameva hi” gomayādirūpaṃ “tādṛśaṃ” śālakādīnāmā “dinimittaṃ” śālūkādiprabandhasya ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇamiti kṛtvā śālūkādiprabandhasyādernna kāraṇābhedo'nyādṛśādutpattiḥ|
1235:219: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvvakṣaṇanimittānāmuttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttirbhavati śarasya tadā śarābhdāvaḥ|
1235:220: tadevaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca śārādestuduttarottarasya bhāvo na tādṛśasya śṛṅgāderiti na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava iti kāryahetoranvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ|
1235:221: yadā'pi śālūkādayaḥ pūrvvapūrvvasvajātinibandhanā anādisantānapravṛttā iṣyante tadā'pi gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcibhdāve'pi tādṛśatvābhāvānna vyabhicāra iti darśayannāha- “asti ca” ityādi|
1235:222: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayorgomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorastyeva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparamanyādṛśatvaṃ “rūpasyābhede'pi” sati|
1235:225: yasmānnākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ “tattve” tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvameva syānna jātibhedaḥ|
1235:227: yeṣāmapi hi samānākāratā keṣāñcibhdāvānāṃ teṣāmapi yata ākārādanyato viśeṣājjātibhedo dṛśyate tato nākārasāmyameva jātyekatve nibandhanam|
1235:228: tathā hi-ākārasāmye'pi kvacit puṣpād bhedo dṛśyate nīletarakusumayoriva sūryayoḥ,
1235:233: tasmādākārasāmyanibandhanaṃ yadyapi ‘tadevedam’ iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sajātīyatāṃ goamayetarajanmanoḥ śālakayorūpakalpayati tathāpi vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanyatayā tayorjātibheda evāvagantavyaḥ,
1235:235: tata eva pratyabhijñānasya bhrāntatayā tatkalpitasya tādṛśatvasyālīkatvāt|
1235:237: yadi punargomayetarādijanmanaḥ śālūkākāderagnidhūmādijanmano vā dhūmādeḥ pratyabhijñāvaśād vilakṣaṇasāmagrīnibandhanatve'pi samānasvabhāvataiva syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt ?
1235:239: yadi hi yā svajāti [lakṣaṇapratyayāntarasahitā sāmagrī yā ca] svajātinirapekṣā gomayādirūpā śālūkādeḥ,
1235:240: dhūmasya vā yā'gnīnadhanādilakṣaṇā yā ca śakramūrdvādisvabhāvā dhūmādyātmikā avi(kā tasyāḥ vi)
1235:241: lakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā avilakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśameva kāryaṃ dhūmaśālūkādikamutpadyeta tadā na ‘kāraṇasya’ sāmagrīrūpasya “bhedābhedābhyāṃ” vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇyābhyāṃ kāryasya “bhedābhedau” vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇye tajjātīyavijātīyātmake syātāmiti kṛtvā “viśvasya” sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ “ahetukau bhedābhedau” sajātīyavijātīyatve syātām|
1235:242: tasmād yatra vilakṣaṇā sāmagrī tatra kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpatve'pi vijātīyataiva kāryasyeti|
1235:243: nanu dhūmendhanādisāmagrībhede'pi dhūmasya na jātibhedamāmananti vidvāṃsaḥ,
1235:259: tasmād indhanameva tayopādānakāraṇam agnyādisahakāripratyayāhitaviśeṣaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dhūmakāryamaṅgārādi bhinnākṛti janayatītyalamatiprasaṅgena|
1235:260: nanu ca yadi nāma sāmagrībhede'pi kāryasya bhedo na jātaḥ tadā kāraṇabhede satyapi tasyābhāvāt tasyāhetukatā'stu,
1235:263: yadā hi sāmagrībhede satyapi kāryasya bhedo na jāta iti tasyāhetukatvam- na hi hetau satyabhavataḥ kathañcidapi hetumattopapadyate-tadā yo'pyasāvabhedaḥ kāryasya so'pi sāmagryoḥ bhinnatvādasatyabhede jāta iti kutastasyāpi hetumattā ?|
1235:264: yathā hi hetau satyabhavato na hetumattā tathā hetāvasatyapi bhavato hetumattā kutaḥ syāt ?|
1235:268: pratibhāsābhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato bhede'pyupalakṣaṇāt|
1235:269: syādetat- yo hyatādṛśādapi tādṛśobhdavamicchati tasya bhedābhedayorahetukatvamiṣṭameva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ hetumanta ityata āha- “tadvyatiriktaśca” ityādi|
1235:270: nahi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo'sti yastayorahetukatve'pi hetumān syāt|
1235:273: ananyatve'pi bhedābhedayorbhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārācca kutaḥ sambandhitā ?|
1235:274: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya eva na kutaścid bhinno'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate,
1235:275: tadā tabhdāve'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt ?|
1235:277: tāvapi yadi bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvastadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo'bhedo vā syāt|
1235:278: punastadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyamanavasthā ca bhedābhedayoḥ|
1235:279: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt,
1235:281: vāt; tasya ca hetvantarāt paścād bhavatastato'nyatvāpatteḥ|
1235:284: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayorvyatirekavatoḥ vaiyarthyam;
1235:286: tasmād vaiśeṣikādikalpitayorbhedābhedayorvviśeṣasāmānyātmanorayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ tayorahetukatve bhāvasvabhāvasyaivāhetukatvamāpatitam|
1235:288: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvvadaiva syāt|
1235:293: yasmā “dapekṣayā hi” tasyāpeṣaṇīyasya hetorbhāve bhavanto'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ “kādācitkāḥ” kadācibhdavā yujyante,
1235:297: punarapi vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaramāha- “vyavasthāvāṃśca” pratiniyataḥ “sādhyeṣu” ghaṭapaṭādiṣu “sādhanānāṃ” mṛttantvādīnāṃ loke yo “niyogo” ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍameva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn,
1235:298: paṭārthī ca tantūneva na mṛtpiṇḍam ityādikaḥ sa na syāt|
1235:299: kasmāt ? ityāha- “kāraṇānāṃ”-sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ “śaktayaḥ”- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇāstāsāṃ “pratīniyame” kācideva sāmagrī kvacideva kārye upayujyate nānyā'nyatretyevaṃrūpe “hi” yasmāt “kiñcideva” mṛdādikaṃ “kasyacideva” ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate “nāparaṃ” tadvilakṣaṇaṃ tantvādikam kasmādevam ?
1235:302: kasmāttasyaiva tatra śaktirnnānyasya ityata āha “tayoḥ” mṛdādestantvādeśca “tajjanasvabhāvatvena” ghaṭādijananasvabhāvatvena “itarasvabhāvatvena ca” ghaṭādyajananasvabhāvena ca “bhedāt” anyatvabhāvāt|
1235:304: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāmapi śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇādapi avilakṣaṇakāryopagamāt tadā “ tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi” dhūmādijananasvabhāvaṃ yat kāraṇagnīndhanādisāmagrīlakṣaṇaṃ tadvilakṣaṇādapi śakramūrdvādeḥ kṣaṇāśrayeṇa vā dhūmādestasyāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanyasya dhūmasya tatkṣaṇasya cotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ “na tajjananaśakteḥ pratiniyamo” vivakṣitadhūmādikāryajananaśaktipratiniyamaḥ|
1235:309: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe'pyanyādṛśataiveti sarvvastādṛśastathāvidhajanmeti siddham|
1235:310: syānmatam-vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryāstallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścideva ca tathābhāvānna yathoditadoṣāvasara ityata āha “tajjananaśaktisāmye tu” ityādi|
1235:311: uktameva tāvad atra pūrvvapakṣe ‘na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyasvabhāvaḥ’ ityādikaṃ dūṣaṇam|
1235:312: abhyupagamyāpīdamāha- “yādṛśī hyagnisahakāriṇaḥ” tadādhīyamānavikārasye “ndhanasya” svabhedena dhūmabhedahetoḥ “śaktiḥ” ātmātiśayastādṛśyeva śakramūrddhno dhūmasya vā yadi tatsāmagrījanyadhūmavilakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktirātmātiśayalakṣaṇā tadā tacchaktisāmye tadevāgnīndhanādikamevārthānnāmāntareṇoktaṃ syāt,
1235:314: sa eva hyagnirya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati,
1235:316: yadi ca śakramūrdvāderapi evaṃ bhavatā'bhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ syāt,
1235:318: yata evam “iti” tasmāt “kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “dṛṣṭa”mekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamatadrūpavyavṛttenātmanā “kāraṇa”mindhanādikaṃ santānāpekṣayā kṣaṇāpekṣayā vā “ na vyabhicarati” tadvilakṣaṇādanyato na bhavatīti kāryahetāvanvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ sidhyatīti|
